column1: Often increases the number of times you can carve.
Sometimes increases the number of times you can carve.
Speeds up Health recovery. Antidote Herb and Bitterbug success rate become 100%.
Slows down Stamina depletion while evading and blocking.
Increases damage for small and large Barrel-Bombs.
Increases potency of Abnormal Status attacks.
Often decreases damage taken.
Sometimes decreases damage taken.
Decreases likelihood of Horns breaking.
Decreases likelihood of Pickaxes and Bug Nets breaking.
Maximizes the number of times you can talk to the Veggie Elder.
Increases Combination success rate by 20%.
Increases Combination success rate by 10%.
Sometimes raises the number of times items can be gath- ered at Gathering Points.
Increases the power of Normal Shots (Normal S).
Increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.
Sometimes increases the num- ber of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.
Greatly increases Attack and Defense when Health is very low.
Helps your weapon retain Sharpness when attacks are deflected.
Decreases Stamina depletion when escaping from large monsters.
Increases damage of project- iles such as Stones and Throwing Knives.
Prevents flinching  when discovered by a monster.
Slows Stamina depletion from dashing and prevents knock- backs when transporting.
Prevents being knocked back when transporting an item.
Increases the likelihood of large monsters encountered in Quests being weak.
Ensures you always begin in  hidden areas during Quests with random starting points.
Increases the number of Hunter Rank Points received for completing a Quest.
Greatly extends the invulnerability window when getting up.
Extends the invulnerability period when getting up.
Increases Bowgun damage
Increases kick damage.
Increases damage inflicted by the Shadow Box gesture.
Slows Stamina reduction and grants resistance to some attacks when climbing.
Grants resistance to some attacks when climbing.
Prevents knockbacks while carving.
Prevents stumbling when jumping down from high places.
Grants a temporary Attack boost when you use the Kick Back gesture for a while.
Increases Sharpness when you strike immediately after an attack is deflected.
Causes food effects to remain even after you faint in battle.
Increases the likelihood of stunning monsters.
Increases the amount of zenny received at the end of a Quest.
Increases the effect time of Felvine Bombs.
Increases cannon
Prevents fainting one time  when damage taken exceeds your remaining Health.
Increases the likelihood of monsters fleeing when hit with a Dung Bomb.
Halves the effect durations of lowered Defense and elem- ental resistance conditions.
Prevents damage received from lava.
Makes it easier to escape when pinned down by a large monster.
Displays large monsters on the Map at Quest start for a limited amount of time.
Often speeds up sharpening time.
